title: **4 Weeks Free!!** Stunning Uptown 1 Bedroom Modern Design! Luxury Fin
neighborhood: Uptown * Capitol Hill * Downtown Denver * Lodo * City Park
posting_body: ['**SPECIAL** 4 WEEKS FREE!!', '~~~', 'New ProRated Rent = $2480 Monthly / 13 Months.', 'Originally $2705 /month', 'Call or Text Patrick to set up your for Fast Personal Showings or Virtual Showings', 'Welcome to a life surrounded by tangible quality and ravishing beauty.', 'The experience of a place so real, so absolutely right, everything else simply fades away.', '* Open Floor Plans with Downtown + Mountain Views', '* Oversized Patios | Balconies for Indoor + Outdoor Living*', '* Covered Garage Parking', '* Hardwood-Style Plank Flooring Throughout', '* Defined Entryway with Custom Built-In Bench', '* Wine Fridge in Each Apartment', '* Luxury Bathrooms with Walk-In Stone + Glass Showers*', '*', 'Large Walk-In Closets + Built-In Shelving*', '* Designer Kitchens with Quartz Countertops, Euro-Style Cabinets + Open Shelving', '* Gas-Range + GE Stainless Steel Appliances', '* Matte Black Moen(R) Align Fixtures', '* GE Front-Loading Smart Washer + Dryer', '* Hexagon Tile Backsplash in Kitchens and Baths', '* Two Rooftop Terraces + Mountain | Downtown Views', '* Lush Gardens + Outdoor Spa', '* Fitness + Wellness Center with Yoga | Barre Equipment, Technogym Fitness Strength Training', '* Outdoor Kitchen with Water Features + Fireside Seating', '* Pet Wash + Grooming Station', 'Call or Text Patrick to set up your for Fast Personal Showings or Virtual Showings', '*Restrictions Apply.', 'Pricing, availability and lease terms subject to change anytime!']
